languages.text: {n}Навигатор нервно перебирает кустистую бороду.{/n} "Вот как. Единственный верный союзник в системе пал, как и мои надежды на поддержку его династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Навигатор нервно перебирает кустистую бороду.{/n} "Вот как. Единственный верный союзник в системе пал, как и мои надежды на поддержку его династии".

languages.text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."
languages.original_text: {n}Навигатор нервно перебирает кустистую бороду.{/n} "Вот как. Единственный верный союзник в системе пал, как и мои надежды на поддержку его династии".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."
{n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."
{n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."
{n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

languages.text: {n}年迈的导航者不安地用手指梳理着他浓密的胡须。{/n}“原来如此。我们在这个星系唯一忠诚的盟友已经不在了，他的王朝前来救援我们的希望也破灭了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的导航者不安地用手指梳理着他浓密的胡须。{/n}“原来如此。我们在这个星系唯一忠诚的盟友已经不在了，他的王朝前来救援我们的希望也破灭了。”

languages.text: {n}El Navegante se pasa los dedos por su frondosa barba, nervioso.{/n} «Ya entiendo. Nuestro único aliado leal en todo el sistema ha desaparecido... junto con mi esperanza de recibir el apoyo de su dinastía».
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Navegante se pasa los dedos por su frondosa barba, nervioso.{/n} «Ya entiendo. Nuestro único aliado leal en todo el sistema ha desaparecido... junto con mi esperanza de recibir el apoyo de su dinastía».

languages.text: {n}航宙士は心配そうに、豊かな髭を指で梳いた。{/n}「そういうことか。この星系における唯一の忠実な同盟者が…その王朝からの支援という私の希望とともに消えてしまったようだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}航宙士は心配そうに、豊かな髭を指で梳いた。{/n}「そういうことか。この星系における唯一の忠実な同盟者が…その王朝からの支援という私の希望とともに消えてしまったようだ」

languages.text: {n}Der Navigator streicht sich nervös mit den Fingern durch den buschigen Bart.{/n} "So ist das also. Unser einziger loyaler Verbündeter im System — fort, und damit auch all meine Hoffnung auf Unterstützung von seiner Dynastie."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Navigator streicht sich nervös mit den Fingern durch den buschigen Bart.{/n} "So ist das also. Unser einziger loyaler Verbündeter im System — fort, und damit auch all meine Hoffnung auf Unterstützung von seiner Dynastie."

languages.text: {n}Le navigateur se passe nerveusement les doigts dans la barbe.{/n} « Je vois. Ainsi, notre seul allié fidèle dans ce système est mort, et avec lui s'envolent mes espoirs de soutien de la part de sa dynastie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le navigateur se passe nerveusement les doigts dans la barbe.{/n} « Je vois. Ainsi, notre seul allié fidèle dans ce système est mort, et avec lui s'envolent mes espoirs de soutien de la part de sa dynastie. »

languages.text: {n}Rotacı, parmaklarını gür sakalının içinde endişeyle gezdiriyor.{/n} "Demek öyle. Sistemdeki tek sadık müttefikimizi kaybetmişiz desene. Hanedanlığının desteğini alma umutlarım da beraberinde uçtu."
languages.original_text: {n}The Navigator anxiously combs his fingers through his bushy beard.{/n} "So that's how it is. Our only loyal ally in the system — gone, along with my hopes of support from his dynasty."

traits.locale_text: {n}Rotacı, parmaklarını gür sakalının içinde endişeyle gezdiriyor.{/n} "Demek öyle. Sistemdeki tek sadık müttefikimizi kaybetmişiz desene. Hanedanlığının desteğini alma umutlarım da beraberinde uçtu."
